html:
9.10.18  1:55 pm   do you hate swearing bill?

     if you mean saying words like "fuck" and "shit", i like doing that but i don't like calling it 'swearing' that doesn't make sense to me

9.10.18  1:53 pm   Are words just letter-chords?

     not quite

9.10.18  12:51 pm   what's it like to be you?

     what's it like not to

9.10.18  12:49 pm   i record myself improvising on the piano to get songwriting ideas and when i listen back to the recordings it feels like some of the musical ideas i come up with just come out of nowhere like magic. have you ever felt that way?

     always

     i bet you have, so i'll also ask: do you still feel that way sometimes?

     always

9.10.18  11:49 am   did your experience here on the questions page make it easier to answer questions in a live panel setting?

     yes

      did you get asked questions at xoxo that you haven't been asked before?

     no

9.10.18  11:24 am   hey you know how in pokemon there is always a building where the game designers have put themselves, as a little funny bonus? maybe you should do that in a song, or music video. put in the designer bill, for just a second

     for many of them i am the entire band and lead singer

9.10.18  10:49 am   in the new front door video did pentagon person scale the two trash cans that are on top of that mountain, or did they haul those cans up there with them? did pentagon perhaps feel like a piece of garbage  ..... twice?

     i did not arrive soon enough to see. was staring at that bad news sign

9.10.18  10:38 am   Can u tell me the 'long gone' chords from day goes on? (voicings and not just the lead sheet chord names would be much appreciated)

     i'm not listening to it again, but if i remember correctly you're going to want (D294 Eb311 F350 Bb466) over F165. then (Db277 Eb311 Ab415 over Ab54)

9.10.18  10:33 am   how do the ideas for your songs?

     funly

9.10.18  10:21 am   Why can't I write songs, only a hundred tiny lil bits of songs?

     because you haven't developed your construction strategies

     Should I buy a Fender Rhodes?

     in my opinion that thing weighs much much more than it's worth

9.10.18  9:22 am   experienced lucid dreams?

     i think i'm in one

9.10.18  9:07 am   Why isnt i wanna be a movie star on spotify anymore?

     yes it is

9.10.18  8:54 am   Is there some deeper meaning behind your songs?

     than what

9.10.18  8:31 am   Was it a bad decision to make a song and video in just 2 weeks?

     no

9.10.18  8:22 am   Why does things randomly explode on me?

     this is not random, you are the chosen one

9.10.18  7:59 am   is there anything you miss about making short videos for vine

     how quickly they can get done

9.10.18  6:33 am   can you prove that you are conscious like me?

     i can if you can

9.10.18  5:00 am   did you washed canada in the end with your soap?

     not necessary, already clean

9.10.18  4:24 am   what's a good pickup line?

     i just got a tsunami warning

9.10.18  3:50 am   hey bill i dunno if you're a good person to talk to about this but someone i can barely consider a friend at this point has personally told me he thinks im ignorant and that he hates me and he wont fucking tell me why, and when i try to ask about it he refuses to discuss it at all like it never happened, and he does shit like this basically every other week out of the blue.  
its taking a toll on my confidence and mental health at this point and i wanna know how i can deal with it without cutting him out of my life completely, hell i dont even know if i want him around at this point but at the very least i wanna know why hes so bent on stabbing my self esteem in the kidneys every so often before i stop talking to him.
can you give any reason why he might be like this, or at least some way to deal with it? ive tried expressing how i feel through drawing and writing and its just stressing me more 

     don't worry, just get away. there's plenty more world to be in

9.10.18  2:41 am   are you feeling more edgy lately because in hallelujah you said "god damn" and in front door you said "fuck" and you rarely swear in your songs

     each song is different and similar to others

9.10.18  1:10 am   if u had a dog what would u name it 

     you made it up you have to name it

9.10.18  12:09 am   what can't u believe?

     why can't you believe i can

9.9.18  11:37 pm   what do you think of the flat earth theory?

      the theory about the theory seems to be much much more popular than the theory

9.9.18  11:20 pm   Why can't I do the writing I'm assigned to do? I'm constantly distracted by everything. Trust me I'm not being lazy.

     maybe that's cause it's not your idea

9.9.18  10:39 pm   Do you make your content completely alone,

     yes

      or do people help you?

     no

      And how?

9.9.18  9:24 pm   Are you gonna go to any more conventions?

     i'm not sure

9.9.18  9:12 pm   How do I deal with the immense pressure from outside sources to be normal?

     be different, instant fun time

9.9.18  9:01 pm   how does one integrate a key change into their song or write a melody or chord progression with a note or chord that isn't in the key?

     i think the important question is, when have you ever heard this done where you liked it ... and have you learned yet what they did on that one

9.9.18  8:36 pm   When a song idea pops into your head, how much time can you safely allow yourself before recording it so it doesn't get forgotten? Like if you're in a long line at the grocery store, would you feel safe waiting until you've checked out and are back in your car?

     probably use text phone memo in that case. stores would be extra unsafe because they usually have music playing in them

9.9.18  8:06 pm   hey so the follow up thing to the creatively stuck question: i've recorded everything i've written except for one song in which i wrote the lyrics first. i really want this song to be good as it's the last song i have to write before i finish my album, and i just can't seem to get a good grasp on the melody that i want.

     first pick the tempo. think of the rest of the album, and now pick what you just wish the tempo was for this song. dial it in and keep it

9.9.18  7:53 pm   life is hard, how can it be less hard?

     could be more boring

9.9.18  7:49 pm   what do you think of teens in school ruining their future with drugs and all sorts of gnarly stuf?

     seems legit

9.9.18  7:00 pm   In i'm Best Friends with my Own Front Door you say that people threw breakfast a the main character at main character and I was wondering if people throwing breakfast at him is autobiographical and also what did the breakfast consist of?

     i thought that was about you, but i guess it's just any time you get things thrown at you, and you are able to use it for it's nutritional and strength building qualities. always a win

9.9.18  6:44 pm   do you make all of your videos by yourself alone,

     yes

      or do you get some help every now and then?

     no

9.9.18  6:25 pm   why did you dramatize that brick scene so much? (blades of grass)

     how else would i have done it?

9.9.18  6:20 pm   hey bill are you making your music for yourself or are you doing it to entertain people

     yes, and more

9.9.18  6:15 pm   you have talked more than once about not beong able to return where you came from. you ok?

     i don't think i have ever talked about that

9.9.18  6:06 pm   Why are signing Simon's checks? Are you perhaps in an illegal drug ring with Simon? Is that why he can't remember anything he was doing or anything he remembers? IS IT BILL?!

     i thought that story was about you

9.9.18  6:04 pm   how did "shaving my piano" get so popular?

     relatability

9.9.18  5:31 pm   Are you more of a "less is more person" or "more is more person"?

     less and more

9.9.18  4:51 pm   What do you do about a "spirit is willing but flesh is weak" kind of scenario, in regard to making things?

     do a bit more exercise in the morning while focusing on what you are going to do

9.9.18  4:41 pm   Ever gunna update your reality page?

     yes

9.9.18  3:45 pm   How do you feel about large objects arriving at great speed from space?

     seems legit

9.9.18  3:32 pm   Will there be a Christmas video this year?

     given the new circumstances it's likely

9.9.18  2:36 pm   so when was the current song written

     first 2 lines last thursday and the rest today

9.9.18  2:06 pm   When are you gonna run for president?

     i am not the right person for that

9.9.18  1:44 pm   Where do birds go during hurricanes?

     somewhere else

9.9.18  1:34 pm   Why is each song of yours on it's own album titled the same as that song?

     it's a single
